articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Site of Ski Resort on Masik Pass
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Site of Ski Resort on Masik Pass
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, visited the Ski Resort on Masik Pass near completion.
					 He went round Masik Pass Hotel, ski service and lodging buildings and resting places in the skiing courses for beginners and amateurs.
					
					 After going round bed rooms, lounges, dining rooms and swimming pool of the hotel etc., one by one, he said that everything inside it looks nice and every aspect and corner are friendly to environment and match the scenery of the mountain.
					
					 He noted that the hotel is a model structure as it has been built as required by the party's policy calling for designing and building anything according to its use and peculiarity, and the best one in the country.
					
					 He said that ski service and lodging buildings and resting places in skiing courses for beginners and amateurs have also been built in such a way as to meet the desire and requirements of the people, afford best convenience to them and suit their emotion and sense of beauty.
					
					 Noting that all the buildings and service facilities have been designed and constructed well, building materials have been properly chosen and facilities have been successfully distributed as intended by the party, he expressed the greatest satisfaction that all of them have been built by the efforts of Koreans and with indigenous technology and the facilities can be operated as they please.
					
					 He learnt in detail about the conditions of skiing courses.
					
					 He said the skiing courses on the Masik Pass Ski Resort are world-class ones in terms of their number and total length.
					
					 Noting the resort is a winter sports complex where visitors can enjoy skiing, skating and sledging, he said they can do so even at night if the facilities are illuminated.
					
					 He called for building more lodging quarters and service facilities that can house hundreds of school youth and children at a time so that those from across the country can enjoy their winter camping by skiing, skating and sledging at the resort.
					
					 Then, he chose sites for new buildings and specified one by one the matters which should not be missed when undertaking the second phase of construction.
					
					 Noting he is deeply touched when thinking of the soldier-builders devotedly carrying out the order issued by the party despite biting cold in December, he extended high appreciation to them, saying the party would never forget the feats they have performed for the country and its people.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun, vice department directors of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Kuk Thae Dies
articles.content:
Kim Kuk Thae Dies
 Pyongyang. December 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Kuk Thae, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK and chairman of the Control Commission of the C.C., WPK, died of acute heart failure and dyspnoea at 18:20 on Dec. 13, at the age of 89.
					 Born into a revolutionary family on Aug. 27, Juche 13 (1924), he grew up to be an able official under the care of President Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country and devotedly worked for the development of the party and the revolutionary armed forces and for the prosperity of the socialist country.
					
					 In the postwar period he devotedly defended the idea and authority of the party and the leader by waging a principled struggle to eliminate the aftereffects of the anti-party, counter-revolutionary factional elements who challenged the party point-blank. He also contributed to establishing solid monolithic ideological system throughout the party and firmly ensuring the party's leadership over the revolutionary armed forces while working at responsible posts of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Korean People's Army (KPA) and people's security organ in the period of the comprehensive socialist construction.
					
					 He worked as an instructor, section chief and vice department director of the C.C., WPK since Juche 45 (1956), as a vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA and director of the Political Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security since Juche 52 (1963), as a department director of the C.C., WPK, principal of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School and secretary of the C.C., WPK since Juche 56 (1967) and as chairman of the Control Commission of the C.C., WPK since Juche 99 (2010).
					
					 He worked as alternate member, member of the C.C., WPK since Juche 56 (1967) and as member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK since September, Juche 99 (2010).
					
					 He was elected a deputy to the 4th SPA in Juche 56 (1967) and worked as a deputy since the 7th SPA in Juche 71 (1982).
					
					 He was awarded a lot of state citations including Order of Kim Il Sung and Order of Kim Jong Il, the highest orders of the DPRK, and Order of National Flag 1st Class for his distinguished feats for the party and revolution, the country and people.
					
					 That day an obituary of Kim Kuk Thae was released in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK and the Presidium of the DPRK SPA.
					
					 Noting that Kim Kuk Thae was a revolutionary soldier faithful to the WPK who dedicated his all to the triumphant advance of the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the leadership of the party and the leader, the obituary said although he died, the exploits he performed for the cause of the party and revolution will be everlasting.
					
					 The Central Committee of the WPK and the Presidium of the DPRK SPA announced that the late Kim Kuk Thae would be accorded a state funeral and formed a funeral committee with Kim Yong Nam as its chairman and Pak Pong Ju and 52 others as its members.
					
					 The funeral committee said that the bier of the deceased is placed at the Sojang Club of Pothonggang District, Pyongyang, it would receive mourners from 10:00 to 19:00 on Dec. 15 and the hearse would leave the club at 08:00 on Dec. 16.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Kuk Thae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Kim Kuk Thae
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Sunday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Kuk Thae, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and chairman of the Control Commission of the WPK Central Committee, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Korean Youth Meet to Remember Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Korean Youth Meet to Remember Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of youth and students "Boundless Is Our Yearning" took place at the Central Youth Hall on Sunday on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 In female solo and chorus "We Yearn for You", reminiscences reading and male chorus "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas", narration and song "Boundless Is Our Yearning" the performers vividly showed boundless reverence of the young vanguard across the country for Kim Jong Il, who brought up the Korean youth into reliable political reserves of the party and successors to revolution.
					
					 The speech of Kye Song Hui, a section chief of the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, struck a chord with the participants. She praised Kim Jong Il for developing the youth league into the vanguard organization shining with the august name of the sun.
					
					 Kim Sin Il and Kim Sin Hyok, students of Kim Il Sung University who were honored with the audience of Kim Jong Il and received the great loving care and trust from him, and Jon Ju Ok, student of Pyongyang University of Dramatic and Cinematic Arts, told about the stories that he took warm care of the youth and brought to bloom their hope and talents.
					
					 Put on the stage were such numbers as story-telling and song "Thanks to the Fatherly General", female duet and panchang "Attraction and Reverence", male solo and panchang "Ode to the Motherland" and poems and choruses "We Know You Only" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives".
					
					 Attending the meeting were Ri Yong Su, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the youth league and youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Chief of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), was interviewed by KCNA on Sunday on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 South Korean people are praying for the immorality of Kim Jong Il, recollecting his great life with deep emotion, the chief said, and went on:
					
					 He devoted himself to the nation. Boundless is the reverence of south Koreans as his life was so great.
					
					 Their voices are reflecting public mindset praising the history of the sun.
					
					 South Korean media have devoted much space to conveying his greatness for the past two years, carrying the portrait of him with a broad smile on his face.
					
					 Posted on many websites of south Korea were articles titled "There is no such great leader in the world as General Kim Jong Il, who devoted himself to the country and nation all his life", "Feats performed by General Kim Jong Il for the Korean nation will shine long" and "The noble soul of Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il, the sun of the nation, will always be cherished in the hearts of fellow countrymen".
					
					 Songs praising him are widely disseminated among south Koreans. These facts help know well about their reverence for him.
					
					 South Koreans' yearning for him is leading to the ardent trust in Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The vanguard fighters of the AINDF and south Koreans will usher in a new June 15 era of independent reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Real Intention to Sell Weapons to S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses U.S. Real Intention to Sell Weapons to S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The United States is mulling selling 14 CH-47Ds to the south Korean puppet forces, according to a foreign press report.
					 The U.S. real intention is aimed to push the tense situation to the worst phase by instigating the south Korean regime to escalate the confrontation with the DPRK on the Korean Peninsula and to justify the moves to ignite a new war under this pretext, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary.
					
					 This year, the U.S. has driven the situation on the peninsula into unprecedented tensions.
					
					 It is a scenario of the U.S. to round off the preparations for igniting a nuclear war to stifle the DPRK, to begin with. It is also seeking to have the U.S. munitions enterprises monopolize the arms market of south Korea as they are floundering due to the cutdown of the government's military spending.
					
					  It is the artifice of the U.S., the dirtiest war merchant, to create a favorable circumstance for the arms sales by fanning up confrontation and expand the arms market in the way of escalating tensions.
					
					 The U.S. is the root cause of escalating tensions and creating the danger of a war and the chief culprit who brings about a new Cold War in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. has persistently resorted to the arms sales and arms buildup aimed at confrontation and hegemony but can never get rid of its poor plight.
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up deterrence for self-defense in an effort to arrest the increasing U.S. threat and hegemony and achieve peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the Asia-Pacific region.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Rebukes S. Korean Regime's Base Behavior
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Rebukes S. Korean Regime's Mean Behavior
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet chief executive, when recently meeting with the U.S. vice-president, asked for "intensifying cooperation in denuclearizing the north", claiming that "alliance with the U.S. is a core axis of stability and peace and it is developing in depth". The south Korean prime minister also cried out for "broad-based strategic alliance of the 21st century style" and "careful cooperation". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a criminal act of the south Korean regime as it is driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula and in the region into a catastrophe as a shock brigade for carrying out its master's hostile policy toward the DPRK and Asia strategy without the dignity and self-respect of the nation, depending on foreign forces and escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 The regime is begging its U.S. master to intensify the "alliance" as it is seeking to do harm to fellow countrymen at any cost by intensifying cooperation with the U.S. against the DPRK under the pretext of the nuclear issue. 
					
					 It announced the "motion on expanding air defence discrimination zone" under the approval of the U.S., a reckless adventure aggravating the regional situation. By doing so, it fully revealed before the international community its poor colors as a servant abandoning the interests of the nation and carrying out the Asia strategy of its masters U.S. and Japan, keen on sycophantic diplomacy.
					
					 With nothing can the south Korean authorities conceal their criminal colors as the group of traitors pushing the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and sparking off tensions while bringing to light their bad habit of sycophancy and dependence on foreign forces.
					
					 They should stop acting rashly, well aware that sycophancy and confrontation with fellow countrymen will bring disgraceful ruin only.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Suppressing Trade Union's Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Suppressing Trade Union's Strike
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Kyunghyang Daily News on Dec. 10 carried an article titled "Regime regarding trade union's strike as illegal without condition".
					 The article said that the regime and the management filed a suit against and indicted 194 persons including the chairman of the Railways Trade Union and relieved more than 6,000 unionists of their jobs, labeling the union's strike illegal.
					
					 This is little short of threatening that they will crack down on the strike of the workers, it charged. It condemned the authorities for labeling any strike of the trade union illegal with no reason.
					
					 The workers staged the strike in protest against the privatization of railways, it held, adding the authorities should abandon the wrong understanding that strike is entirely illegal.

articles.title: Chinese and Korean in China Here
articles.content:
Chinese Families and Family of Korean in China Here
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhang Wei-hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and the family of overseas Korean Son Won Thae arrived here Sunday to take part in the memorial service to be held on the occasion the second anniversary of demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Carried by Pakistani Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Carried by Pakistani Paper
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional on November 30 carried the main contents of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" in its one whole page.  The talk was published in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on the Day of Songun.
					 The talk, made public on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and clarifies the essence and originality of the idea of the Songun revolution and the tasks to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 The paper carried a photo of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un standing together.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Seminars on General Secretary Kim Jong Il's works were held in Romania and Brazil on November 27 and December 9.
					 Present at the seminars were personages of the Socialist Party of Romania and the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.
					
					 The participants observed a moment silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, explained the main contents of Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" and said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il published this work late in the last century when socialism collapsed in East European countries, clarifying the scientific accuracy, validity and truth of socialism.
					
					 He authored lots of works. His ideological and theoretical exploits serve as valuable heritage of not only the Korean revolution but also the world socialist movement.
					
					 He, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party and great leader of the Korean people, was the defender and distinguished leader of the world socialist movement.
					
					 We will as ever struggle in the front against imperialism shoulder to shoulder with the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The exploits of Kim Jong Il are immortal.
					
					 Speakers including Aleksandr Neves Rosendo da Silva, chairperson of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea, in the seminar on Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Advance under the Banner of Marxism-Leninism and the Juche Idea" praised Kim Jong Il as gifted thinker and theoretician and distinguished leader who made immortal contributions to developing the revolutionary theory of working class and accomplishing the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Bangladeshi Organization
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Politics issued a bulletin on Dec. 10 to mark the 22nd anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il and invincible power" said:
					
					 As the DPRK held Kim Jong Il in high esteem as supreme commander of the KPA on December 24, 22 years ago, it could dynamically advance along the road of socialism, demonstrating its might as an invincible power despite the imperialists' desperate moves to stifle it.
					
					 He held higher the banner of Songun at the end of the 20th century when the U.S. styling itself as the only superpower and its followers became evermore undisguised in their moves of aggression and war to realize their wild ambition to dominate the world, being engrossed in their high-handed and arbitrary practices to violate the sovereignty of other countries.
					
					 The political and ideological position of the DPRK has been strengthened in every way thanks to the Songun politics.
					
					 The Songun politics also brought about a decisive turn for building a thriving nation in the DPRK.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Juche Idea Study Committee Held in Benin
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Juche Idea Study Committee Held in Benin
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea took place in Cotonou on Dec. 6.
					 The meeting reviewed the work of the committee in 2013 and discussed its action program in 2014.
					
					 Speakers at the meeting evinced their will to more dynamically conduct activities for studying and disseminating Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism with various forms and methods in 2014, the year marking the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung and the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brilliant Life Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brilliant Life Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Foreign media gave wide publicity to the brilliant life of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Guinean paper Horoya said Kim Jong Il's was a brilliant life of a great revolutionary and a peerless patriot who took an untrodden, thorny path under the red flag and dedicated his all to the country and people.
					
					 The Uruguayan paper La Juventud said his traits are characterized by his love for the people, adding:
					
					 He loved the people so ardently that he pursed benevolent politics rare to be found in the world.
					
					 His greatest pleasure was the happiness of the people.
					
					 He took even a thorny path if it was for the happiness of the people.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in an article posted on its website said Chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il was born in snowy February and the people paid the last farewell with him in snowy December, adding his life was characterized by purity like snow.
					
					 A Bulgarian paper said Kim Jong Il was a model of genuine patriots, adding his love for the country was very sincere and warm.
					
					 The Lao paper Congtap Pasason Lao said his noble life will always be remembered by the Korean people and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Carries Article on Train Coach Displayed at Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Carries Article on Train Coach Displayed at Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Beijing, December 14 (KCNA) -- The Chinese paper Huan Qiu Shibao on Dec. 12 carried an article of its correspondent in Pyongyang under the title "The train coach which makes the Korean people miss their great leader."
					 It said as follows:
					
					 Though a train coach is a transport means, the Korean people have deep meaningfulness about it.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il, whom they ardently revere, visited every nook and corner of the country and various countries of the world by train, and spent even the last moment of his life in train.
					
					 The number of his use of train is 1,647 in all, and the length totals 398,000 km.
					
					 He gave field guidance to many urban and rural areas of the DPRK by train to leave unforgettable memories to the Korean people.
					
					 The DPRK displays the train coach used by him at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on the occasion of the first anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The train coach was arranged well so that he could work there.
					
					 The train coach reminds the visitors of the leader of the DPRK busy with his work.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige sobre terreno campo de esqui de monte Masik
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige sobre terreno campo de esqui de monte Masik
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio sobre el terreno el campo de esqui del monte Masik en visperas de su inauguracion.
					Recorrio primero el Hotel del Monte Masik, el edificio de servicio de esqui y alojamiento y los lugares de descanso en las pistas para principiante y aficionados.
					
					Pasando uno tras otro por los dormitorios, hall de descanso, comedor, piscina y otros del hotel, senalo que es bueno el ambiente general del hotel y todas partes estan adecuadas a la naturaleza y la region montanosa.
					
					Dijo que este hotel es el modelo en que fue materializado la orientacion del partido de dar destaque a la utilidad y la peculiaridad en el diseno y la obra y es el mejor entre los hoteles levantados en nuestro pais.
					
					El edificio de servicio de esqui y alojamiento y los lugares de descanso de las pistas para principiantes y aficionados se construyeron conforme a la aspiracion, la demanda, la comodidad, el sentimiento y la estetica de los habitantes, subrayo.
					
					Se han hecho conforme al proposito del partido el diseno y la obra de todos los edificios y las instalaciones de servicio, la seleccion de materiales de construccion y la disposicion de las instalaciones, senalo y destaco que en particular, le gusto mucho el que el campo de esqui se haya construido con las fuerzas y tecnologias domesticas y lo podemos administrar a nuestras ganas.
					
					Se entero minuciosamente del estado de las pistas de esqui.
					
					Enfatizo que las pistas son de talla mundial en su numero y su largo total.
					
					Diciendo que este campo es la base combinada de deportes invernales que permite esquiar, patinar y divertirse en trineo, subrayo que si se  instalan las iluminaciones se puede divertirse tambien en la noche.
					
					Agrego que se debe construir mas las instalaciones de hospedaje y servicios capaces de hospedar de una vez a cientos de personas para que los jovenes y ninos escolares de todo el pais pasen el campismo invernal esquiando, patinando y divirtiendose en trineo en este campo.
					
					Fijo los solares de los edificios que se construiran nuevamente y enseno uno tras otro los asuntos necesarios en comenzar la obra de la segunda etapa.
					
					Senalo que le conmovia mucho al pensar en los militares constructores quienes  materializan cabalmente aun en medio del frio intenso de diciembre la orden del partido, y les dio maxima evaluacion de que nuestro partido no olvidara nunca sus meritos realizados por la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Le acompanaron los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Hwang Pong So y Ma Won Chun.
